title: WSJ Crossword & Saturday puzzles
description:
Wall Street Journal crossword puzzles and Saturday puzzles

Hey crossword puzzle addicts!

The WSJ puzzles blog, <blogs.wsj.com/puzzle/>, has published crossword and other word puzzles as Java applets (playable in a web browser) since around 1999. Free PDF downloads were added at some point, as an alternative to the applets. The PDFs are made to be printed out, not filled in online.

Although you could just go download these files directly from the blog, the puzzles are not conveniently indexed; it takes hours to get through the links. Many of the links to these files from the blog are no longer working or weren't even posted properly in the first place.

The PDF file names are inconsistent, but in some cases, the current, correct URLs can be guessed, as they often follow certain patterns. So I located and downloaded as many as I could find, and sorted them into folders by year.

I was unable to guess the URLs for the PDFs for these dates:
20080926
20080118
20071130
20070921 and earlier ... maybe they don't exist as PDFs?

Please leave a comment if you can supply any of the missing files.

Thanks, and have fun!
